name: Eleven Goal - Shoot Penalties
description:
Eleven Goal is a fun football game where the best football players are ready to shoot penalties in the final of a tournament. Help your penalty takers score goals against the strongest goalkeepers in the game. Be the top striker and mark penalty with your finger.
• Play different and fun levels of soccer
• Swipe your finger and shoot at goal
• Score goals with effects
• Create incredible curves with the ball
• Fun gameplay: Knock down the boxes, dodge the defenses, shoot the wall, and much more
• Play in training mode to improve your skill
• Change the clothes of the shooter
• Customize the pitcher with 15 different team shirts
• Change the hairstyle and the look of the footballer, with more than 300 styling
Shooting penalties and fouls to score goals with your finger has never been that much fun before.
If you like the app, please rate and comment to help us improve!
